newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU sees 97/98 beet sugar output down to 16 mln t.
newsitem.headline: EU sees 97/98 beet sugar output down to 16 mln t.

text.p: The European Union has forecast 1997-98 beet sugar production falling to 16.0 million tonnes, down from 16.5 million this season, an EU member state official said on Thursday.
